trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> within an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 表示已加入至 XML Web Service 內的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding" /> 的擴充性項目。

trans-unit.source: This class respresents an extensibility element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL) specific to HTTP.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表的擴充性項目中 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的特定 HTTP。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the relative URL of an operation using as the base the location specified by an <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定做為基底使用所指定的位置的作業的相對 URL <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 WSDL 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL relative to the location specified by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding" />, within the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, of the operation supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 URL，其相對於 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpAddressBinding" /> 所支援作業之 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.HttpOperationBinding" /> (在 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件內) 所指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: An unencoded string representing the relative path.
trans-unit.target: 解碼的字串，表示相對的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
